email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Vessel for Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

We are looking to charter a vessel for a shipment of 180,000 MT of iron ore from Tubarão to Qingdao on CIF terms. The required laycan is November 10-15. Could you provide a quote and confirm vessel availability?

Best regards,
James

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Vessel for Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

Thanks for your inquiry. I can offer the MV OCEAN HORIZON, DWT 210,000, LOA 330m, currently available for your cargo. The rate is USD 28 per MT. Laycan is November 10-15 as requested. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Vessel for Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thanks for the quick response. USD 28 seems a bit high given the current market. Can you do better? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate and loading window?

Best regards,
James

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Vessel for Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

Given the current market conditions, I can offer a rate of USD 26 per MT. Demurrage is USD 18,000 per day, pro rata. Loading window is 96 hours. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Vessel for Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

USD 26 sounds better. Can we lock in the MV OCEAN HORIZON with a laycan of November 10-15? Please send over the charter party for review.

Best regards,
James

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Charter Party for MV OCEAN HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

Great, I'll proceed with the booking. Attached is the charter party for your review. Let me know if you need any adjustments.

Best regards,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Re: Fwd: Charter Party for MV OCEAN HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Charter party looks good. We'll proceed as discussed. Thanks for your help!

Best regards,
James
